title: Fitness leader exercise encyclopaedia
creator_contributor_role: Australian Council for Health, Physical Education and Recreation, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Physical education and training
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Physical fitness
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Exercise
description: Designed for trainers, coaches, physical educators and other fitness leaders. Shows over one hundred exercises and sequences and explanations of correct and incorrect techniques. All exercises and sequences are numbered for quick and easy references and grouped for major muscle groups.
